MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void WriteToAudioStream(class System.IO.Stream outputStream) cil managed

Docs.param: The stream that will receive the audio data.
Docs.summary: Writes the entire audio to a stream as raw data.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Audio data is written to `outputStream` in binary form. No header information is included.
The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToAudioStream%2A> method uses the Wave format, but does not include the Wave header. To include the Wave header, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToWaveStream%2A> method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void WriteToWaveStream(class System.IO.Stream outputStream) cil managed

Docs.param: The stream that will receive the audio data.
Docs.summary: Writes audio to a stream in Wave format.
